Detailed Description

cvmx_usbdrd::_uahc_usblegctlsts

For information on this register, refer to the xHCI Specification, v1.0, section 7.1.2. Note that the SMI interrupts are not connected to anything in a CNXXXX configuration.

This register can be reset by IOI reset, or USBDRD()_UCTL_CTL[UAHC_RST], or USBDRD()_UAHC_GCTL[CORESOFTRESET], or USBDRD()_UAHC_USBCMD[HCRST], or USBDRD()_UAHC_USBCMD[LHCRST].
